name: When I'm Gone...
description:
Warning:

The game contains sensitive and unsettling content that some players might find disturbing.

The game is entirely fictional and made to understand and to be entertained. Nothing in this game is meant to be glorified.

If you know someone who’s going through tough times, help them to the best of your abilities

Summary:

When I’m Gone… is a 2D side-scrolling horror game, where you play as a girl in an abandoned school, trapped inside with a monster lurking in every hallway, with the only way out to escape, the girl has to reach to the roof so she can be free.

There is, however, deeper meaning in this school, reflections and messages drove her to her breaking point.

There is only one option…

 

Behind the Scenes:

This game was designed by Jay Miles. He made When I’m Gone… during his second year on a Games Development course at the University of East London. This was his first fully developed game using the Unity Engine. He is very proud of this game and a great step to how far he was from his years of learning how to design games.
